Headline: Russia has suffered more casualties in Ukraine war than all other conflicts combined since WWII: Pentagon
Description: Russia has suffered some 600,000 casualties in its war with Ukraine — more than its losses in every conflict since World War II combined, according to U.S. officials.

Headline: Biden, NATO head claim a stronger Obama response to Crimea invasion may have prevented Ukraine war
Description: Outgoing NATO chief Jens Stoltenberg insisted the war in Ukraine may not have happened if the U.S. and NATO had a stronger response to Russia's invasion of Crimea in 2014.

Headline: Ukraine | Fox News
Description: Ukraine

Headline: In the Russia-Ukraine conflict, war should not be blind: Will Cain
Description: Our leaders need to be rational when it comes to deciding whether to go to war, Fox News host says.

Headline: Russia invades Ukraine in largest European attack since WWII
Description: Russia invaded Ukraine on Thursday by land, air and sea in the largest military attack on European continents since WWII. Civilians are fleeing by trains and cars.

Headline: Reporter's Notebook: Ukraine war one year on, human tragedies and triumphs
Description: Senior Fox News foreign affairs correspondent Greg Palkot reviews a year of reporting from the frontlines of Russia's war against Ukraine.

Headline: Ukraine war has taught us that we are all refugees now
Description: The Ukraine war refugee crisis and my recent encounters with those caught up in it revealed horrors but also resiliency and even a sharp sense of humor.

Headline: Putin warns US, NATO risk war with Russia if long-range strike bans lifted for Ukraine
Description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has issued another warning to the West they that risk being 'at war' with Moscow as the U.S. and the U.K. consider lifting strike bans on Ukraine's defensive capabilities.

Headline: The biggest twists in Russia-Ukraine war in 2023
Description: Russia faced infighting among its forces as ministry generals and mercenary forces butted heads, but Ukraine did not manage to make the gains it promised.

Headline: White House confirms more than $100B spent on Ukraine war
Description: EXCLUSIVE: The White House confirmed the Biden administration has spent more than $100 billion in taxpayer resources on the war in Ukraine, according to documents obtained by Fox News Digital.

Headline: Focus group reacts to Donald Trump's claim that Ukraine war is 'dying to be settled'
Description: Republicans significantly backed former President Trump's Ukraine comments during Tuesday's debate, while Democrats appeared unmoved by his remarks and independents showed a slight drop-off.

Headline: Ukraine shows off capabilities of new drone-dropped, flamethrowing robotic war dogs: video
Description: The Ukrainian Ministry of Defense shared a video of a robotic war dog being used in the field with a soldier, who was able to take advantage of the device's thermal imaging.

Headline: China's hesitation to discuss Russia-Ukraine war raises concerns of pro-Moscow stance
Description: China has displayed hesitance to engage in discussions about the Russia-Ukraine war, voicing reservations. The country has claimed to have a neutral stance.

Headline: Dogs of war: Britain's new robots aiding Ukraine, terrorizing Russia as drones continue dominating battlefield
Description: The BAD2 drone can serve a range of roles, including reconnaissance and delivery of vital battlefield technology that can help tip a conflict in favor of Ukraine.

Headline: Indian PM Modi visits Russia visit for first time since start of Ukraine war
Description: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi begins his first visit to Russia since Putin launched his invasion of Ukraine, complicating the relationship between India and Russia.

Headline: Trump shooting plot suspect Routh was interviewed by NYT on Ukraine war efforts in 2023: 'Sounded ridiculous'
Description: The New York Times previously interviewed the man suspected of plotting to assassinate former President Trump, Ryan Routh, regarding his efforts in Ukraine.

Headline: Trump describes how he could solve Russia-Ukraine conflict in 24 hours
Description: Former President Trump described his plan to stop the war in Ukraine within 24 hours of re-entering the White House in a Sunday interview with Fox News.

Headline: Hungary's leader meets Putin in Moscow to discuss Ukraine war, sparking EU criticism
Description: Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban met with Russian President Vladimir Putin to discuss the Ukraine war, drawing criticism from EU leaders against appeasement.

Headline: North Korean troops now fighting for Russia in Ukraine, Seoul says
Description: North Korea is now sending troops to fight and die in Ukraine alongside Russian soldiers, according to Seoul’s defense minister, Kim Yong-hyun.

Headline: Nearly 50K Russian men have died in Ukraine war, nearly 9x larger than Russia's official figure: new study
Description: Russia's military losses in Ukraine are nearly nine times larger than its government and Russian President Vladimir Putin are officially reporting, a new independent study found.

Description: Ukraine is poised to take steps toward its European Union aspirations after a decade of war. The country sees membership as validation of its fight to embrace European values.

Headline: Record number of NATO members reach defense spending goal as Ukraine war persists
Description: NATO Secretary-General Jens Stoltenberg said 23 of NATO's 32 member states are hitting the alliance's goal of spending at least 2% of their gross domestic product on defense.

Description: The U.S. under President Biden's leadership continues to send money, military supplies and humanitarian aid to Ukraine as the country continues fighting Russia.

Headline: Situation in Ukraine is 'dire' as ammunition supplies drop on US, Europe 'starvation diet'
Description: Ukraine is forced to choose between protecting civilians' infrastructure and bolstering its front lines as Russia adapts its war strategy and Congress fails to send Kyiv more defensive aid.

Description: National Security advisor Jake Sullivan acknowledged that pre-war assessments suggested Russia would perform 'significantly' better than it has during the invasion of Ukraine.

Description: The coming year in Ukraine will depend largely on which side — Kyiv or Moscow — can mobilize its reinforcements sooner and in greater force while the other side struggles with morale.

Description: The Kremlin is scrambling to downplay Russian President Vladimir Putin's failure to squash Ukraine's invasion that some officials says could persist for months as Moscow focuses on Donetsk instead.

Headline: Fox News journalist Benjamin Hall injured covering Ukraine war
Description: Fox News journalist Benjamin Hall was injured in Ukraine Monday while reporting on the Russian invasion.

Description: Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko has pledged to join Russia in its invasion of Ukraine if even "one soldier" attacks a citizen of his country.

Description: There are currently 15,000 ongoing investigations into Russian war crimes in Ukraine since its war began in February says prosecutor Iryna Venediktova

Description: Russia fired more than 100 missiles at Ukraine during an 18-hour aerial assault that started on Thursday and carried into Friday. At least 18 people were killed.

Description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken called Russia's actions in Ukraine "war crimes" and vowed that there will be accountability "one way or another."

Headline: Ukraine is officially America's new forever war. President Biden, how does this end?
Description: The on-going war in Ukraine has become an obsession for lawmakers and many others in Washington. We are now told to expect the war to last for six to seven years. So what's the endgame?

Headline: Putin shakes up leadership in Ukraine war as defense officials warn of eastward focus
Description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has instated a new commander to lead the war in Ukraine as western officials warn Moscow will focus on the Donbas region.

Headline: Russia-Ukraine war: Deadly fight in Donbas 'one of the most brutal battles... for Europe,' Zelenskyy says
Description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said the fighting in the Donbas has become one of the most historically brutal battles "in Europe and for Europe."

Headline: Russia-Ukraine war: Belarus will join fight if even 'one soldier' attacks territory, president says
Description: Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko has pledged to join Russia in its invasion of Ukraine if even "one soldier" attacks a citizen of his country.

Headline: Pentagon threatens North Korean soldiers will be 'cannon fodder' if sent to aid Russia in Ukraine
Description: North Korean engineering and construction personnel deployed to Russia-occupied Ukraine would be "cannon fodder," the Pentagon warned at a Tuesday press conference.

Headline: White House silent after John Kerry laments Ukraine war's carbon emissions
Description: The White House ignored requests for comment asking whether it agreed with Special Presidential Envoy for Climate John Kerry's concerns about the Ukraine war's climate impact.

Headline: Russia has suffered more casualties in Ukraine war than all other conflicts combined since WWII: Pentagon
Description: Russia has suffered some 600,000 casualties in its war with Ukraine — more than its losses in every conflict since World War II combined, according to U.S. officials.

Headline: Biden, NATO head claim a stronger Obama response to Crimea invasion may have prevented Ukraine war
Description: Outgoing NATO chief Jens Stoltenberg insisted the war in Ukraine may not have happened if the U.S. and NATO had a stronger response to Russia's invasion of Crimea in 2014.

Headline: Ukraine | Fox News
Description: Ukraine

Headline: In the Russia-Ukraine conflict, war should not be blind: Will Cain
Description: Our leaders need to be rational when it comes to deciding whether to go to war, Fox News host says.

Headline: Russia invades Ukraine in largest European attack since WWII
Description: Russia invaded Ukraine on Thursday by land, air and sea in the largest military attack on European continents since WWII. Civilians are fleeing by trains and cars.

Headline: Reporter's Notebook: Ukraine war one year on, human tragedies and triumphs
Description: Senior Fox News foreign affairs correspondent Greg Palkot reviews a year of reporting from the frontlines of Russia's war against Ukraine.

Headline: Ukraine war has taught us that we are all refugees now
Description: The Ukraine war refugee crisis and my recent encounters with those caught up in it revealed horrors but also resiliency and even a sharp sense of humor.

Headline: Putin warns US, NATO risk war with Russia if long-range strike bans lifted for Ukraine
Description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has issued another warning to the West they that risk being 'at war' with Moscow as the U.S. and the U.K. consider lifting strike bans on Ukraine's defensive capabilities.

Headline: The biggest twists in Russia-Ukraine war in 2023
Description: Russia faced infighting among its forces as ministry generals and mercenary forces butted heads, but Ukraine did not manage to make the gains it promised.

Headline: White House confirms more than $100B spent on Ukraine war
Description: EXCLUSIVE: The White House confirmed the Biden administration has spent more than $100 billion in taxpayer resources on the war in Ukraine, according to documents obtained by Fox News Digital.

Headline: Focus group reacts to Donald Trump's claim that Ukraine war is 'dying to be settled'
Description: Republicans significantly backed former President Trump's Ukraine comments during Tuesday's debate, while Democrats appeared unmoved by his remarks and independents showed a slight drop-off.

Headline: Ukraine shows off capabilities of new drone-dropped, flamethrowing robotic war dogs: video
Description: The Ukrainian Ministry of Defense shared a video of a robotic war dog being used in the field with a soldier, who was able to take advantage of the device's thermal imaging.

Headline: China's hesitation to discuss Russia-Ukraine war raises concerns of pro-Moscow stance
Description: China has displayed hesitance to engage in discussions about the Russia-Ukraine war, voicing reservations. The country has claimed to have a neutral stance.

Headline: Dogs of war: Britain's new robots aiding Ukraine, terrorizing Russia as drones continue dominating battlefield
Description: The BAD2 drone can serve a range of roles, including reconnaissance and delivery of vital battlefield technology that can help tip a conflict in favor of Ukraine.

Headline: Indian PM Modi visits Russia visit for first time since start of Ukraine war
Description: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi begins his first visit to Russia since Putin launched his invasion of Ukraine, complicating the relationship between India and Russia.

Headline: Trump shooting plot suspect Routh was interviewed by NYT on Ukraine war efforts in 2023: 'Sounded ridiculous'
Description: The New York Times previously interviewed the man suspected of plotting to assassinate former President Trump, Ryan Routh, regarding his efforts in Ukraine.

Headline: Trump describes how he could solve Russia-Ukraine conflict in 24 hours
Description: Former President Trump described his plan to stop the war in Ukraine within 24 hours of re-entering the White House in a Sunday interview with Fox News.

Headline: Hungary's leader meets Putin in Moscow to discuss Ukraine war, sparking EU criticism
Description: Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban met with Russian President Vladimir Putin to discuss the Ukraine war, drawing criticism from EU leaders against appeasement.

Headline: North Korean troops now fighting for Russia in Ukraine, Seoul says
Description: North Korea is now sending troops to fight and die in Ukraine alongside Russian soldiers, according to Seoul’s defense minister, Kim Yong-hyun.

Headline: John Kerry fears Russia-Ukraine war will distract from climate change
Description: John Kerry warned Wednesday that Russia’s war against Ukraine is going to distract the world from the climate change crisis.

Headline: Unity at G20 fails over differences on Ukraine war, Russia, US snub each other
Description: Tensions between world leaders remained heightened during G20 talks in Bali, Indonesia as top economies look to address the biggest problems facing the globe.

Headline: Nearly 50K Russian men have died in Ukraine war, nearly 9x larger than Russia's official figure: new study
Description: Russia's military losses in Ukraine are nearly nine times larger than its government and Russian President Vladimir Putin are officially reporting, a new independent study found.

Headline: Ukraine edges closer to European Union membership after decade of war
Description: Ukraine is poised to take steps toward its European Union aspirations after a decade of war. The country sees membership as validation of its fight to embrace European values.

Headline: Record number of NATO members reach defense spending goal as Ukraine war persists
Description: NATO Secretary-General Jens Stoltenberg said 23 of NATO's 32 member states are hitting the alliance's goal of spending at least 2% of their gross domestic product on defense.

Headline: US leads the rest of the world with $196 billion given to Ukraine amid war with Russia
Description: The U.S. under President Biden's leadership continues to send money, military supplies and humanitarian aid to Ukraine as the country continues fighting Russia.

Headline: Situation in Ukraine is 'dire' as ammunition supplies drop on US, Europe 'starvation diet'
Description: Ukraine is forced to choose between protecting civilians' infrastructure and bolstering its front lines as Russia adapts its war strategy and Congress fails to send Kyiv more defensive aid.

Headline: Russia-Ukraine war: White House still helping to 'facilitate' Zelenskyy protection
Description: National Security advisor Jake Sullivan acknowledged that pre-war assessments suggested Russia would perform 'significantly' better than it has during the invasion of Ukraine.

Headline: Russia's war on Ukraine unlikely to end in 2024; Congress plays pivotal role in direction conflict takes
Description: The coming year in Ukraine will depend largely on which side — Kyiv or Moscow — can mobilize its reinforcements sooner and in greater force while the other side struggles with morale.

Headline: Russia | Fox News
Description: The Russian Federation is the largest country in the world by area, spanning two continents. Following the Russian Revolution, the USSR was established, become the world’s first constitutionally socialist stated. It emerged as a recognized superpower and rival to the United States during the Cold War, but collapsed and dissolved in 1992. It has since rebuilt into the world’s 12th largest economy by GDP. It’s current president is Vladimir Putin.

Headline: Moscow targeted with largest drone attack of war with Ukraine: Russian officials
Description: Russian officials on Wednesday said air defenses deterred one of the largest Ukrainian drone strikes on Moscow since the war began in 2022.

Headline: Russia looks to downplay Ukraine invasion as 'new normal' while Putin fails to stop war on home turf: report
Description: The Kremlin is scrambling to downplay Russian President Vladimir Putin's failure to squash Ukraine's invasion that some officials says could persist for months as Moscow focuses on Donetsk instead.

Headline: Ukraine war takes dramatic turn as Russian soldiers push to recapture northeast Kharkiv territory
Description: Ukrainian authorities ordered evacuations of multiple areas as Russian troops moved to reclaim areas in the Kharkiv province that it previously occupied.

Headline: Trump said he could end Ukraine war nearly a year ago but still hasn’t laid out specifics
Description: Former President Donald Trump has said he'd end the war in Ukraine in a matter of 24 hours but has not detailed what such a plan would look like.

Headline: Ukraine war conditions become breeding ground for infectious disease outbreaks
Description: As Ukrainians flee their country from Russia’s military onslaught, they face the prospect of the invisible enemy – bacteria and viruses.

Description: Russia has suffered significant logistical and strategic issues, but videos and photos on social media of captured equipment show poor maintenance and quality.

Description: There are currently 15,000 ongoing investigations into Russian war crimes in Ukraine since its war began in February says prosecutor Iryna Venediktova

Description: Russia fired more than 100 missiles at Ukraine during an 18-hour aerial assault that started on Thursday and carried into Friday. At least 18 people were killed.

Headline: Ukraine war widows providing aid on the front lines
